episodes.title: Tithing keeps God from killing us? 😵‍💫
episodes.description:
Let’s deceive people to make more money with our pyramid scheme, shall we? 🙄

Tithes were given by 11 Israelite tribes to the 12th: the Levites. Tithes weren’t currencies, they were crops and livestock, and were given thrice a year. It was an Old Testament law solely for the purpose of providing for the Levites (who were allowed to sell those tithes to buy alcoholic beverages with the yield).

1. Most Christians aren’t part of the Israelite tribes.
2. Even if they were, I doubt their pastor was a Levite.
3. Even if he was, Old Testament law doesn’t apply under the New Covenant.
4. Even if it did, tithes were given thrice a year (not once a month).
5. Even if it wasn’t, pastors should be content with tithes in the form of crops and livestock.

Also, Jesus made it clear we ought to give as much as we were able to give, lest we go hungry. And forcing members to tithe from their student loans is just wrong…

episodes.title: Pastor Nomdo Schuitema spreekt zichzelf tegen in 10 seconden
episodes.description:
Pastor Schuitema, successor of pastor Valk, "leader" of the conference church in Zwolle, and thereby "leader" of the Netherlands, Africa, and China. He's basically the pope of Europe as pastor Mitchell was the pope of the United States.
"See this week, various people received a nasty e-mail with all sorts of nasty lies about our church. That can happen, I've heard such things are spread around on the Internet by our church; I've never read them. But now a couple of people received these messages simultaneously, that's just very nasty."
HOW CAN HE KNOW THEY ARE LIES IF HE HASN'T READ THEM?
